duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and direct claims management staff to ensure compliance with departmental guidelines and regulatory requirements.
Collaborate with Vice President and claim management staff to create and update departmental policies and procedures.
Participate in the development and execution of departmental objectives and strategies.
Communicate department objectives, policies, procedures, and plans to staff for efficient and effective operation.
Participate in claim file audits to ensure claims handling and reserving standards are met.
Assist in the preparation and monitoring of the departmental budget.
Stay current in local, state, and federal changes impacting claims pertaining to Coverys lines of coverage and territories.
Interact regularly with peers in key business units to ensure overall business/strategy goals are met.
Serve as a member of the Reserve and Settlement committee to manage appropriate levels of reserving and settlement authority for cases.
Guide, support, and mentor staff in their strategies and practices impacting individual claim decisions.
Responsible for interviewing, hiring, and training employees; planning, directing work; appraising performance; rewarding and disciplining employees; addressing complaints, and resolving problems.
Provide in-office oversight/guidance to all members of the department during office days.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from a four-year college or university; JD preferred
